Class.name: VKReader.Data.Post
Class.Description:
This class mirrors (with some properties disabled) functionality of vk post class.
For more information see: http://vk.com/dev/post This version ignores reposting.

Property.name: ID
Property.Description: Holds post id in context of author (user or commuinty).

Property.name: OwnerID
Property.Description: Holds id of the owner of the wall, where post was published (positive or negative number for user or community accordingly.)

Property.name: FromID
Property.Description: Holds id of the author of the post (positive or negative number for user or community accordingly.)

Property.name: Date
Property.Description: Holds date when this post was published in horolog format (UTC)

Property.name: Time
Property.Description: Holds time when this post was published in horolog format (UTC)

Property.name: Text
Property.Description: Holds text contained in this post.

Property.name: FriendsOnly
Property.Description: Holds whether or not this post was marked as friends-only post.

Property.name: PostType
Property.Description: Holds type of this post in context of vk posting system.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Description:
This callback method is invoked by the %New method to provide notification that a new instance of an object is being created.

If this method returns an error then the object will not be created.

It is passed the arguments provided in the %New call.

For this particular class it accepts only one argument: %ZEN.proxyObject in special format - it must have vk-post-like fields.
For further information see https:/vk.com/dev/post If instead of returning a %Status code this returns an oref and this oref is a subclass of the current class then this oref will be the one returned to the caller of %New method.
Method.Implementation: if (oProxy '= "") { set ..ID = oProxy."id" set ..OwnerID = oProxy."owner_id" set ..FromID = oProxy."from_id" do ..Text.Write(oProxy."text") set ..PostType = oProxy."post_type" if (oProxy."friends_only" '= "") { set ..FriendsOnly = oProxy."friends_only" } set ..LikesCount = oProxy."likes"."count" set ..RepostsCount = oProxy."reposts"."count" set ..CommentsCount = oProxy."comments"."count" do ##class(VKReader.Utils).ConvertUnixTimeToHorolog(oProxy."date", .horologDate, .horologTime) set ..Date = horologDate set ..Time = horologTime } set status = ..%ValidateObject() quit status

Method.name: %OnValidateObject
Method.Description:
This callback method is invoked by the %ValidateObject method to provide notification that the current object is being validated.

If this method returns an error then %ValidateObject will fail.
